title: Mammoth Cave National Park: Education
body: Mammoth Cave: A Classroom Beneath Your Feet  Mammoth Cave National Park is a great place to learn about caves, forests, groundwater, wildlife and history. Whether you have students working on school reports or you're preparing for a visit, these pages provide everything you'll need to make the world's longest known cave your very own outdoor classroom. Mammoth Cave's Environmental Education Program also offers hands-on professional development opportunities to assist teachers with multidisciplinary approaches to classroom topics.                   Parks As Classrooms  Make Mammoth Cave your classroom through in-class programs, curriculum materials and field trips.          Professional Development   These workshops provide a series of field-tested, hands-on, multidisciplinary approaches to classroom topics.         Distance Learning   Through our distance learning program, we can bring Mammoth Cave into your classrooom.
